title: Regenerate heart-on-white-circle favicons and align HTML + generator

requirements.summary: Regenerate and check in a complete heart-on-white-circle favicon PNG set using the exact filenames referenced by the app.
acceptanceCriteria: Each generated PNG visually shows a crisp, centered pink heart on a solid white circular background (no transparent background).
Any previous/old favicon assets are removed or no longer referenced, so only the new favicon set is used by the app.

file_operations.description: Replace/regenerate the 16x16 favicon PNG so it matches the required style: centered pink heart on a solid white circular background (no transparency). Ensure this exact file path/filename is present and correct.

Replace/regenerate the 32x32 favicon PNG so it matches the required style: centered pink heart on a solid white circular background (no transparency). Ensure this exact file path/filename is present and correct.

Replace/regenerate the 180x180 Apple touch icon PNG so it matches the required style: centered pink heart on a solid white circular background (no transparency). Ensure this exact file path/filename is present and correct.

Replace/regenerate the 192x192 Android icon PNG so it matches the required style: centered pink heart on a solid white circular background (no transparency). Ensure this exact file path/filename is present and correct.

Replace/regenerate the 512x512 Android icon PNG so it matches the required style: centered pink heart on a solid white circular background (no transparency). Ensure this exact file path/filename is present and correct.
If present, remove any legacy root favicon file so it cannot be preferred by browsers over the new generated set; ensure the app only relies on `/assets/generated/*` references.

requirements.summary: Replace favicon link tags in frontend/index.html so all referenced favicon assets exist and match the regenerated set.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/index.html` contains favicon `<link>` tags for 16x16, 32x32, Apple touch 180x180, and Android 192x192 + 512x512 that point to existing files under `/assets/generated/`.
There are no stale/duplicate favicon references that point to missing files or old filenames.
In a hard refresh (or incognito), the browser loads a favicon successfully (network requests for the favicon return 200).

file_operations.description: Ensure the favicon `<link>` tags are fully aligned to the regenerated assets under `/assets/generated/` and replace/remove any stale or duplicate favicon references so only these are used: `/assets/generated/favicon-16.dim_16x16.png`, `/assets/generated/favicon-32.dim_32x32.png`, `/assets/generated/apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png`, `/assets/generated/android-chrome-192.dim_192x192.png`, `/assets/generated/android-chrome-512.dim_512x512.png`.

requirements.summary: Update the favicon generator utility to produce the required heart-on-white-circle style and keep sizes/filenames aligned with index.html.
acceptanceCriteria: `generateHeartFavicon` renders a solid white circle background and then the pink heart centered on top (not a transparent background).
`FAVICON_SIZES` continues to match the favicon filenames referenced by `frontend/index.html`.
Running the generator logic (via any existing internal tooling/workflow) produces images consistent with the checked-in assets.

file_operations.description: Update `generateHeartFavicon` to draw a non-transparent background that matches the selected style (solid white circular background, then centered pink heart). Keep `FAVICON_SIZES` aligned with the favicon filenames/sizes referenced by `frontend/index.html`.
